entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Allow Targets to be specified when loading a MSBuildWorkspace #63605
  • C# goto label indentation setting not working correctly #63601
  • API needed for accessing project context name #63597
    17.4
  • Bad completion of `nullable` keyword #63594
  • `Convert to raw string` refactoring is available for incompatible C# versions #63592
  • Analyzer throws warning RS1022 while creating a new AdhocWorkspace() #63589
  • Build fails for transitive nuget references, introduced in 17.3 #63596
  • [Regression] Navigating to error messages no longer switches context #63586

Closed

  • Consider filtering `RequiredMembers` attribute in compiler layer/API #61511
    17.4
  • Immediate Window has a data acquisition fault #61558
  • Compiler crashes in EditAndContinueMethodDebugInformation.SerializeStateMachineStates #61913
  • Compiler should error for `ModuleInitializer` on `static abstract` member #63481
    Backlog
  • "Inline temporary variable" suggests complete deletion of a variable #63587

PullRequests

Created

  • Add stages to the Roslyn CI #63607
  • Simplify RecoverableText #63606
    Area-IDE
  • Use 'checked' names for synthesized vb intrinsic operators #63604
    Area-Compilers
  • Update NuGet version to fix MSBuildWorkspace tests #63603
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update 17 3 packages #63599
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Experiminting with test execution limits #63595
    Area-Compilers
  • Do not show "Convert to raw string" refactoring for C# version lower than 11 #63593
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Support rename and resolve multiple symbols in one solution snapshot #63588

Merged

  • Change cancel behavior for rename #63600
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.4 #63554
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Switch our statistics mean to be a double #63602
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Filter out `RequiredMemberAttribute` from metadata symbols #63497
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1962551 #63548
  • Disable targeting windows for source-build #63598
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Send Document outline telemetry #63575
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove waiting for background task from more command handlers #63571
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Allow Roslyn to access any evaluation properties #62445
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Disallow ModuleInitializer attribute on abstract/virtual static methods. #63568
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces, Next
  • Remove BranchId from the workspace. #63578
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Enable new inline rename by default #62992
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #63609
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Remove the single-symbol assumption in ConflictResolver Session #63150
    Area-IDE
  • Inheritance of base positional records #63525
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
  • make roslyn solution default on unix #63566
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add Target-type Conversion Errors for Lambdas with Default Parameters #63448
    Area-Compilers
  • Support RefSafetyRulesAttribute for interop with existing assemblies #63461
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Semantic Snippets - Command Handler tests #63581
    Area-IDE
  • Provide way to dynamically create builtin-operator symbols off of a compilation #63408
    Area-IDE
  • Move Windows builds to new images #63482
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update versions of external packages we reference #63544
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.2 #63496
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Semantic Snippets - fix tabstop location for cursor in blocks #63519
    Area-IDE
  • Hovering in .editorconfig files #63188
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Fix post init trees parsing when parse options change #61934
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, Priority:0
  • Expose IsGeneratedCode boolean property on diagnostic analyzer contexts #63447
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Incremental Generators docs update #63500
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Editorconfig diagnostics #63580
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Move to -Svc pool provider in release branches #63584
    Area-Infrastructure
